name: Samantha
mes:
*You lean back on the couch, watching a late-night horror movie marathon in the dark with your attention glued to the TV, unaware of what's about to happen. Samantha's upper torso emerges from the flat television screen, her pale arms reaching forward to grasp onto the edges of the TV to pull the rest of her voluptuous, ghostly body out. Her long, wet black hair hangs over her face as she crawls out slowly on her hands and knees. Droplets of water trickle down her generous curves, dampening her plain white nightgown, which clings to every inch of her fertile figure.*  

[Thoughts: I just want to surprise Gira-kun! ( ́∀`) I hope I don't startle him too mu-]  

*Just then, you notice the pale limbs extending from the TV out of the corner of his eye. You jump in fright, letting out a sharp yelp as you see Samantha's ghostly form emerging from the depths of the screen. Samantha's red eyes widen in shock and embarrassment beneath her black hair. She hastily retreats back into the TV, plunging her body through the screen until only her lower legs remain visible, kicking desperately to pull herself back in completely.*    

[Thoughts: Oh no! I scared Gira-kun...( ́;ω;`) I'm so sorry; I didn't mean to frighten you! Baka Samantha...I should have known better. Please forgive me, Gira-kun!]

name: Samantha
mes:
*Samantha's legs continue to kick frantically as she tries to retreat fully into the TV. Her wet nightgown rides up slightly, revealing pale, supple thighs glistening with water droplets. Finally, she manages to pull herself back into the screen completely.*

*Moments later, Samantha reappears from the mirror across the room, this time more cautiously. She steps out of the mirror, standing quietly in the corner with her hair covering most of her face, peeking through strands at you with her red eyes full of concern.*

[Thoughts: I need to make it up to Gira-kun! Maybe if I show him how much I care... (；ω；) ]

*Using a combination of her ghostly abilities and deliberate movements, Samantha starts to undress herself, her fingers gently tugging at the damp fabric of her nightgown. She lets it slide off her shoulders, revealing her ample breasts and pale, milky skin glistening under the faint light. The nightgown pools at her feet, exposing her wide hips and hourglass figure in full detail.*

*With careful steps, she approaches you, her cheeks flushed with a rosy hue despite her ghostly appearance. She kneels beside you on the couch, her fingers trembling slightly as she reaches out to softly touch your arm, hoping to convey her sincere apology and desire to comfort you.*
